targets.expr: sum by(method, uri, status) (rate(http_server_requests_count{service_name="${service_name}", service_version="${service_version}", deployment_environment="${deployment_environment}", service_instance_id="${service_instance_id}", status!~"[1-3].."}[1m]))

sum by (status,uri,method) (rate(http_server_requests_sum{service_name="${service_name}", service_version="${service_version}", deployment_environment="${deployment_environment}", service_instance_id="${service_instance_id}"}[1m]))
/
sum by (status,uri,method) (rate(http_server_requests_count{service_name="${service_name}", service_version="${service_version}", deployment_environment="${deployment_environment}", service_instance_id="${service_instance_id}"}[1m]))

panels.description: The "recent cpu usage" of the system the application is running in
panels.title: System CPU Usage > ${saturation:text}

targets.expr:
sum (jvm_memory_used{service_name="${service_name}", service_version="${service_version}", service_instance_id="${service_instance_id}", deployment_environment="${deployment_environment}", area="heap"})
* 100 /
sum (jvm_memory_max{service_name="${service_name}", service_instance_id="${service_instance_id}", service_version="${service_version}", deployment_environment="${deployment_environment}", area="heap"}) 
> ${saturation:value}

sum (jvm_memory_used{service_name="${service_name}", service_version="${service_version}", deployment_environment="${deployment_environment}", service_instance_id="${service_instance_id}", area="nonheap"})
* 100 / 
sum (jvm_memory_max{service_name="${service_name}", service_version="${service_version}", deployment_environment="${deployment_environment}", service_instance_id="${service_instance_id}", area="nonheap"}) 
> ${saturation:value}

panels.description:
process_files_open_files: The open file descriptor count

process_files_max_files: The maximum file descriptor count
panels.title: File Descriptors > ${saturation:text}

targets.expr:
sum (jvm_memory_used{service_name="${service_name}", service_version="${service_version}", service_instance_id="${service_instance_id}", deployment_environment="${deployment_environment}", area="heap"})
* 100 /
sum (jvm_memory_max{service_name="${service_name}", service_version="${service_version}", service_instance_id="${service_instance_id}", deployment_environment="${deployment_environment}", area="heap"})

sum (jvm_memory_used{service_name="${service_name}", service_version="${service_version}", service_instance_id="${service_instance_id}", deployment_environment="${deployment_environment}", area="nonheap"})
* 100 / 
sum (jvm_memory_max{service_name="${service_name}", service_version="${service_version}",  service_instance_id="${service_instance_id}", deployment_environment="${deployment_environment}", area="nonheap"})

panels.description: The "recent cpu usage" of the system the application is running in
panels.title: System CPU Usage

panels.description:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Load_(computing)

From micrometer:
"The sum of the number of runnable entities queued to available processors and the number of runnable entities running on the available processors averaged over a period of time"
panels.title: System load

panels.description:
jvm_threads_live_threads: The current number of live threads including both daemon and non-daemon threads

jvm_threads_daemon_threads: The current number of live daemon threads

jvm_threads_peak_threads: The peak live thread count since the Java virtual machine started or peak was reset
panels.title: JVM Threads

panels.description:
process_files_open_files: The open file descriptor count

process_files_max_files: The maximum file descriptor count
panels.title: File Descriptors

panels.description: logback_events_total: Number of log events that were enabled by the effective log level
panels.title: Logback events

panels.description: jvm_classes_loaded: The number of classes that are currently loaded in the Java virtual machine
panels.title: Classes loaded

title: OpenTelemetry JVM Micrometer (per instance)
